subject: Baseball
Bonuses
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Rodriguez is only five home runs from tying Willie Mays’s career mark, which under his contract would trigger a $6 million bonus, but the Yankees say they won’t pay it.
snippet: Rodriguez is only five home runs from tying Willie Mays’s career mark, which under his contract would trigger a $6 million bonus, but the Yankees say they won’t pay it.
